extracted_text:
On August 24, 2025, NTPC Ltd. had one significant corporate development .

Commercial operation of new solar capacity: NTPC Green Energy Limited (NGEL), a subsidiary of NTPC, announced the commercial operation date (COD) for a new 50 MW solar project in Bhuj, Gujarat.

Project details: The new capacity is part of a larger 150 MW solar project.

Impact on total capacity: This addition increases the NGEL Group's installed capacity to 7,247.58 MW and the NTPC Group's total installed capacity to 83,341 MW.
